name: Attack of Tomato
description:
Two-button platformer for Ludum Dare 34 Jam by hikimori911, DeomonRUS and Vurfen

Developed using Unreal Engine 4 Blueprint system

Plot:
Once upon a time angry tomato have decided to become a master of the world. Also he realized that shiny diamonds help him to grow.

Controls:
Keyboard - Z, X
Gamepad - Right Trigger, X(left facial button)
Notice: use Z+X or RT+X for pause

If you want to support us on LD34 please use this link http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=p...

P.S. We have versions for Linux and Mac OS X too, but we need testers. If you want to participate - write a comment

Please use fixed versions. There are not new functionality, just improved overall stability
